name: Plausible
description: Plausible provides more privacy-friendly web analytics.

getDocuments.script: Array.from(Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('h2')).filter(el => el.textContent.startsWith('Invoices'))[0].closest('div').querySelectorAll('table tbody tr')).map(row => { const cells = row.querySelectorAll('td'); const date = cells[0].innerText.trim(); const total = cells[1].innerText.trim(); const url = cells[2].querySelector('a').href; const match = url.match(/receipt\/([^\/]+)/); const id = match ? match[1] : null; return { id, date, total, url }; })
